Reviews.Title: Very good cell phone
Reviews.Author: Walter Vargas Navarro "Walter Vargas"
Reviews.Content: I really likes this phone, it have all the app's I need, run in Android, the screen is big, then it makes the keyboard comfortable for my thick fingers. Buy it with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Leiva
Reviews.Content: I was exactly what I was expecting and right on time. I am very happy with the product and looking forward to shopping again.

Reviews.Title: beware of seller
Reviews.Author: J. Jennings
Reviews.Content: First off I can say that this is a really great phone, large screen, great reponse time, and very sleek looking. i purchased this phone originally hoping it would be new. When I recieved it I could tell it was a refurbished phone then on top of that the power button doesn't work.Not only did I pay, and was promised, a new phone. I recieved a used and broken one for a new phone price. I have tried to contact the seller AEG wireless numerous times for a refund but they have not answer back any of my emails. I have now contacted amazon about the matter and luckily I work at amazon so I know the matter will be dealt with. Bottom line... Do not buy from AEG wireless, they are so unprofessional.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone
Reviews.Author: Star
Reviews.Content: I like this phone a lot! I also like the fact that it comes with many free apps that make it easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Jhon Canelo
Reviews.Content: El producto llego en el tiempo estimado, cumplió con todos los parámetros de la venta, a pesar de estar usado sus condiciones físicas son excelentes. Excelente vendedor, muy confiable y 100% recomendable

ProductInfo.Features:
Android OS v4.0, HTC Sense, Super IPS LCD2, Touchscreen, Gorilla Glass
Beats Audio, MP4/MP3, Stereo FM Radio with RDS
8MP camera, autofocus, LED Flash, 1080p HD video recording, geo-tagging, face detection
Wi-Fi, A-GPS support, Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP
HSDPA 850 / 1700 / 1900 / 2100
ProductInfo.Name: HTC One X Unlocked GSM Android SmartPhone - No Warranty (White) with Beats Audio
